q: We bask in the reflected glory of this scrappy, banged-up bunch that ran the table and knocked off some pretty good teams in hostile stadiums to advance to one of the most exciting Super Bowls ever. I'll tell you what, Green Bay, we're going to be right here next year doing this exact same thing, Packers quarterback and Super Bowl MVP Aaron Rodgers said to a thunderous ovation from the crowd. Fresh from Disney World in Florida and David Letterman in New York, he declared himself`` pretty tired right now.''

It can safely be said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, Sergio Marchionne said Monday in a statement. Mr. Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman and will focus externally on deals, partnerships, customers, broader business relationships and government outreach. Mr. Page will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. Sergey Brin , the last of the triumvirate at the top of Google's management team, will devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. It's a shocking

The congressman isn't criticizing John McCain 's decision, but says the senator's voice will be needed soon. It would be helpful for all of us to deal with the question of rhetoric, hyperbole, hate, and anger. John McCain has national prominence and prestige and it would be welcome for him to come and help change the tone. But John McCain has no plans to speak publicly, nor is the possibility even being discussed.`` Barack Obama John McCain is not trying to politicize this tragedy, period,'' says his spokeswoman Brooke Buchanan,
